§6§lHigh rate of SARS-CoV2 nonsense spike genomes coding for prematurely truncated proteins§r

§8§oAlessio D'Alessandro§r

§72021§r

Comments: \u00a77\u00a7oA systematic sequencing error in the original long-read data (recurrent insertions/deletions in T or A homopolymer regions) appeared to survive the consensus-based error-cleaning procedure and to significantly affect
results. Moreover, at page 20, the theoreticalmodel of prematurely truncated genomes needs an integration to account for the host's innate immune responsebesides antibody response\u00a7r
